translations: n．发脾气，发火，暴怒：通常指儿童因为生气、沮丧或受挫而突然大发雷霆的行为。
· The child threw tantrums when he didn't get what he wanted.
孩子得不到他想要的东西时就会发脾气。

sentences.sentence: I've had quite enough of your tantrums.
sentences.translation: 我已经受够了你那臭脾气！

sentences.sentence: Children often throw tantrums at this age.
sentences.translation: 儿童在这个年龄经常犯脾气。

sentences.sentence: She cried almost continually and threw temper tantrums.
sentences.translation: 她几乎哭个不停，还大发脾气。
